```{r}
library(xtable)
library(lubridate)
library(knitr)
tailN <- 50
needDateFormat<-1
tmp <-
  read.table(
    "clipboard",
    header = TRUE,
    sep = "\t",
    stringsAsFactor = F,
    na.strings = c("NA", "-", "－", "… ", ".", ""),
    check.names = F
  )
if(needDateFormat==1){
dateFormat = "%Y-%m-%d"
if (length(unique(day(tmp[, 1]))) == 1) {
  dateFormat = "%Y-%m"
}
if (length(unique(month(tmp[, 1]))) == 1) {
  dateFormat = "%Y"
}
tmp[, 1] <- format(as.Date(tmp[, 1]), dateFormat)
}
tmp[is.na(tmp)]<-''
kable(tail(na.omit(tmp), tailN), row.names = F)
```
